## 🧠 Ideas

- How can LLMs enable us to ingest massive streams of unstructured information, incorporate diverse perspectives and distill them into actionable insights that align with public opinion? [Democratic Deliberation]{.badge .text-bg-secondary} [🎓 MS Thesis]{.badge .text-bg-secondary} [<i class="bi bi-diagram-3"></i> ArgMap](https://argmap.bhatia.dev/){.btn .btn-primary}

- How do we leverage AI to best develop critical thinking skills in the classroom? How do we maintain our cognitive abilities? [🌿 Lodestone](https://maggieappleton.com/lodestone/) is a great thought experiment in this space. [AI for Critical Thinking]{.badge .text-bg-secondary}

- How can LLMs assess student homework and provide meaningful feedback? [AI for Critical Thinking]{.badge .text-bg-secondary} [<i class="bi bi-github"></i> AutoGrader](https://github.com/aadityabhatia/autograder){.btn .btn-primary}
